about_the_game:
Buy our Comic to get a head start on Omen's Story:

Prepare for an odyssey of blood and vengeance in "One Man's Eternal Night," a colossal 3D action-adventure experience. Step into the shoes of Prince Omen, cursed to an infernal island, a twisted purgatory where escape is earned in blood.

Key Features:

Limitless Combat Possibilities: Omen's hands are his weapons. Shape them into dual axes, a towering greatsword, or a colossal hammer. Your imagination is the limit.

Unleash Supernatural Powers: Command the elements, manipulating solids, liquids, and gases. Transform into a werewolf, a swarm of bats, or become an immovable force, all at your fingertips.

A Symphony of Adversaries: Face relentless waves of opponents, each more deadly than the last. The game's adaptive AI ensures that the island's horrors evolve to challenge even the most seasoned vampire.


Witness Omen's Resurgence: As Omen feeds on the life force of his foes, you will witness his transformation from a spectral remnant to a formidable force, his skin regaining color and vitality with each victorious battle.

Demon Hounds Hunt You: A constant shadow, demon hounds lurk in the dark, their sinister howls a chilling reminder of the perils that await.

Forge Your Legend: Witness Omen's transformation from a spectral remnant to a legendary force, each victory etching his saga in the annals of Valancia.

Escape the Accursed Island: Navigate treacherous terrain, uncover hidden secrets, and battle unspeakable horrors in your relentless pursuit of freedom.

Contact Us: omenthegamesa@gmail.com


All visual footage of the game will be subject to change.

content_descriptors.notes: You are a Vampire...Lots of blood.

detailed_description:
Buy our Comic to get a head start on Omen's Story:

Prepare for an odyssey of blood and vengeance in "One Man's Eternal Night," a colossal 3D action-adventure experience. Step into the shoes of Prince Omen, cursed to an infernal island, a twisted purgatory where escape is earned in blood.

Key Features:

Limitless Combat Possibilities: Omen's hands are his weapons. Shape them into dual axes, a towering greatsword, or a colossal hammer. Your imagination is the limit.

Unleash Supernatural Powers: Command the elements, manipulating solids, liquids, and gases. Transform into a werewolf, a swarm of bats, or become an immovable force, all at your fingertips.

A Symphony of Adversaries: Face relentless waves of opponents, each more deadly than the last. The game's adaptive AI ensures that the island's horrors evolve to challenge even the most seasoned vampire.


Witness Omen's Resurgence: As Omen feeds on the life force of his foes, you will witness his transformation from a spectral remnant to a formidable force, his skin regaining color and vitality with each victorious battle.

Demon Hounds Hunt You: A constant shadow, demon hounds lurk in the dark, their sinister howls a chilling reminder of the perils that await.

Forge Your Legend: Witness Omen's transformation from a spectral remnant to a legendary force, each victory etching his saga in the annals of Valancia.

Escape the Accursed Island: Navigate treacherous terrain, uncover hidden secrets, and battle unspeakable horrors in your relentless pursuit of freedom.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 graphics

name: Omen(One,Man's,Eternal,Night)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Gen6 CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Arktek Nvidia GT210 1GB DDR3 64-bit HDMI / DVI / VGA Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: NA

short_description: ARE YOU A MONSTER LOST IN HELL'S EMBRACE, OR THE GUIDING LIGHT IN THIS ISLAND OF DAMNATION? Confront the eternal struggle within: succumb to the night's demonic allure or rise as the blazing beacon against the shadows. Unravel your fate in the harrowing tale of OMEN on this infernal island.
